description: ​Microsoft has fixed a known issue affecting Outlook for Microsoft 365 users that caused problems sending emails for those with too many nested folders. [...]
title: Microsoft fixes Outlook email sending issue for users with many folders

description: Texas healthcare provider UMC Health System was forced to divert some patients to other locations after a ransomware attack impacted its operations. [...]
title: Ransomware attack forces UMC Health System to divert some patients

description: The Evil Corp cybercrime syndicate has been hit with new sanctions by the United States, United Kingdom, and Australia, with the US also indicting one of its members for conducting BitPaymer ransomware attacks. [...]
title: Evil Corp hit with new sanctions, BitPaymer ransomware charges

description: Law enforcement authorities from 12 countries arrested four suspects linked to the LockBit ransomware gang, including a developer, a bulletproof hosting service administrator, and two people connected to LockBit activity. [...]
title: Police arrest four suspects linked to LockBit ransomware gang

description: Microsoft fixes a known issue in the Windows KB5043145 preview update that causes reboot loops, freezes systems, and breaks USB and Bluetooth devices. [...]
title: Microsoft fixes Windows KB5043145 reboot loops, USB and Bluetooth issues

description: Today, Microsoft announced the release of Windows 11, version 24H2, the next feature update for its operating system (also known as the Windows 11 2024 Update). [...]
title: Windows 11 24H2 now rolling out, here are the new features
